::Spears:;

She was still in his arms.  She looked out across the valley and 
stared at all it's beauty.  "I never knew such a place still 
existed.  Untouched by the war.  It's beautiful here."  She sighed 
and marvelled at how this little patch of paradice was still living 
and remain unharmed.  She looked into Strikers eyes and saw the same 
fire she had seen earlier.  She closed her optics and kissed him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker stops, looking down a cliff. In front of him and Spears 
stretched the 
> valley that he had been heading to. It was covered with grass, 
trees rising 
> (can you believe I missed a point on a Precalt quiz because I 
misspelled 
> "rise"??) from the ground, providing shade and a calm feeling. On 
either 
> side, hills rose, cooling it down, and giving it more shade.
> 
> The place looked beautiful.
> 
> "Well, dear," he says to Spears, "How do you like it?"
